Considering these two points, it seems unlikely that taking modafinil will aid in someone attempting suicide because modafinil generally has a stimulatory effect which makes it difficult for users to fall asleep. If you're trying to commit suicide, then taking modafinil could actually make things more difficult due to its stimulating effects. The answer is: false.
